name: Almost Out
description:
Control Gee as you attempt to escape a planet stuck between two extremes!!

Pierce the dark with the powerful SunSeed. Defeat and avoid the advancing Staraith and other dangerous foe using quick reflexes, unique tap inputs and rad powers. Rank Gee and other unlockable characters up so they may utilize extra and more powerful abilities. The farther you venture into the forest the more opposition you will face, always be prepared!!
Outscore people from all over the world as you climb the Almost Out Leaderboard.
Challenge the big boss of the Staraith, but you'll need to get to him first!!
Earn dozens of costume pieces for Gee as well as various awesome items to help in your escape.
Each enemy type and hazard present a drastically different challenge.
Earn characters and equip them how you see fit to prepare for the dangers of the night.
Mixing and matching costumes and powers offers endless ways to challenge the Staraith and dozens hours of replay value.

Fight through the night with a friend in 2 player endless and the brand new Super Staraith mode. Can you defeat the big boss of the Staraith?!

Keep going, you're Almost Out!!
